desc: Read a magic inscription on the wall

text: After several hours of walking (and a few minutes of skipping) $n$ came across a well that looked so old, it was as if it would crumble to dust if $they$ touched it.
$They$ noticed the bucket was close to the surface of the well and so $they$ took a look inside. $They$ could see what was inside! It was...
A mysterious potion of unknown consequence!
Just barely able to reach it, $n$ grabbed the item and stuffed it into $their$ inventory.
